message.content:
Subject: Resignation - [Your Name]

Dear [Boss's name],

Please accept this email as formal notification that I am resigning from my position as [Your Job Title] at [Company Name], effective [Your Last Day]. 

Thank you for the opportunity to work at [Company Name] for the past [Number] years. I have learned and grown significantly during my time here, and I appreciate the support and guidance you have provided me.

I wish you and the company all the best in the future.

Sincerely,
[Your Name]
